title: Cowley County teen hurt in accidental shooting
content:
COWLEY COUNTY, Kan. (KWCH) A Cowley County teen was hurt in an accidental shooting over the weekend.
The sheriff's office says around 2 p.m. on Sunday, deputies were dispatched to the 22000 block of 12th Road.
There they found a 15-year-old with a gunshot wound to the thigh. They say the teen was cleaning his dad's revolver when it discharged and stuck him in the top of his right thigh.
The teen was flown to St. Francis Hospital in Wichita for treatment.
NewsCow (http://bit.ly/2ec7Gy9) says he is currently listed in good condition.
